msg-invalid-preview: We're sorry, the preview cannot be generated properly due to an error in your configuration file. Please double-check your configuration and try generating the preview again.
msg-non-linkable: Please create more pages and try again.
msg-pathname-helper: Please enter text that starts and ends with letters or numbers. In between, you can use letters, numbers, underscores (_), and hyphens (-). Make sure the text doesn't start or end with an underscore or hyphen.
